96ffab0e-24b9-43b3-bf23-77aba161c3a0.description: Earners of the Microsoft Office badge can employ Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Access tasks to achieve business results.
96ffab0e-24b9-43b3-bf23-77aba161c3a0.name: Microsoft Office

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a computer information systems office course with a passing grade to earn the badge (80% or higher).

86ed71e2-5e6b-4694-a5f7-8fc519d09465.description: Earners of the Project Management badge learn academic and practical aspects of the project management profession with an emphasis on the application of project management principles and techniques in a real-world context. Earners are prepared to use the cycle of project definition, planning, execution and control to accomplish objectives within the given constraints on time and resources.
86ed71e2-5e6b-4694-a5f7-8fc519d09465.name: Project Management

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a project management course with a final average grade of 80 or higher.

cbe739f0-e3e1-4ea0-8a1d-655bf5b945ab.description: Based on the SERVE Model of Leadership, badge earners will learn the five strategic ways leaders serve and apply those concepts in a business environment. At the conclusion of the course, badge earners will demonstrate an understanding of the facets of the SERVE Model, including see and shape the future, engage and develop others, reinvent continuously, value results and relationships and embody the values.
cbe739f0-e3e1-4ea0-8a1d-655bf5b945ab.name: Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a leadership course with a final average grade of 80 or higher.

fcfda397-9ffb-4442-bf1f-77d142bf308f.description: Earners of the Digital Marketing badge are prepared to conduct basic SEO, search engine marketing, PPC, social media marketing, and ORM activities. Badge earners are prepared to assume a variety of marketing positions in corporate, private, government, and nonprofit organizations. They are also prepared to pursue degrees in business and marketing.
fcfda397-9ffb-4442-bf1f-77d142bf308f.name: Digital Marketing

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a digital marketing course with a final average grade of 80 or higher.

01676c71-5d5b-402f-b0fc-37fec0a634d2.description: Earners of the LinkedIn Marketing badge acquire the principles and methods of optimizing and managing a LinkedIn account as part of a marketing strategy, including leveraging LinkedIn Groups, using LinkedIn advance search, advertising on LinkedIn, and building a personal reputation as an industry authority.
01676c71-5d5b-402f-b0fc-37fec0a634d2.name: LinkedIn Marketing

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a LinkedIn marketing course with a final average grade of 80 or higher.

f72a2866-51c0-441f-bd25-a7659ba88b40.description: The Lean Six Sigma White Belt Certification is a professional level certification that prepares recipients to add organizational value through the application of the Lean Six Sigma methodology. A Lean Six Sigma White Belt understands the foundational knowledge and methodology of Lean Six Sigma. Because of the academic understanding gleaned through the classroom instruction, the LSSWB recipient is prepared to function as an entry level Lean Six Sigma practitioner.
f72a2866-51c0-441f-bd25-a7659ba88b40.name: Six Sigma White Belt

badge_template_activities.title: One course.
Take the exam with a score of 80% or higher.

83fe2bc4-b01c-4de7-b324-8303cd6c2910.description: Earners of the YouTube and Mobile Marketing badge learn the principles and methods of using YouTube as part of a marketing strategy, including how to set up a business channel, customize the environment, generate views, build community, share video across other social channels, and utilize advertising on YouTube. Streaming video apps and mobile marketing strategies are also introduced.
83fe2bc4-b01c-4de7-b324-8303cd6c2910.name: YouTube and Mobile Marketing

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a YouTube marketing course with a final average grade of 80 or higher.

bc637abc-9fb3-4402-95db-76e126e10e8b.description: Earners of the Marketing Research badge learn the principles of consumer behavior and apply those principles to develop and test a theory about the behavior of real-world consumers. Earners collect primary empirical data, analyze the data, and draw implications to gain relevant business intelligence.
bc637abc-9fb3-4402-95db-76e126e10e8b.name: Marketing Research

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a consumer behavior course (BUS 421) with an 80 or higher AND score a 90 or higher on the term research project.

79f13a5c-d5a4-4af4-9c3e-3a70ec49525f.description: Earners of the Pinterest and Instagram Marketing badge learn the principles and methods of using Pinterest and Instagram Mobile as part of a marketing strategy, including optimizing a business page, organizing pages for the best customer experience, and integration with other social media platforms to create a seamless social marketing campaign.
79f13a5c-d5a4-4af4-9c3e-3a70ec49525f.name: Pinterest and Instagram Marketing

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a Pinterest and Instagram marketing course with a final average grade of 80 or higher.

dfb4a767-8214-4816-b495-87ab227ddea7.description: Earners of the Twitter Marketing badge learn principles and methods of utilizing Twitter as part of a marketing strategy, including setting up a business presence on Twitter, optimizing and managing an account, finding and following influencers and opinion leaders, and engaging with customers and prospects.
dfb4a767-8214-4816-b495-87ab227ddea7.name: Twitter Marketing

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a Twitter marketing course with a final average grade of 80 or higher.

ccb6d8fc-b8d8-4348-9532-f0ef523580f8.description: Earners of the Blogging and Content Marketing badge learn the principles and methods of creating and executing an effective content marketing campaign as part of a marketing strategy, including selection of the best platform, development of a key phrase strategy, creation of compelling blog content, promotion of the blog within social media, and online reputation management.
ccb6d8fc-b8d8-4348-9532-f0ef523580f8.name: Blogging and Content Marketing

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a content marketing course with a final average grade of 80 or higher.

10e011a4-22ca-4b3c-a8f7-338f6519a85d.description: Earners of the Certified Social Media Marketer badge will develop professional skills in using social media as a tool for marketing products and services, from creating an integrated social media marketing strategy to executing that strategy across major social media platforms, including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, YouTube, and emerging channels.
10e011a4-22ca-4b3c-a8f7-338f6519a85d.name: Certified Social Media Marketer

badge_template_activities.title: Earn the Social Media Marketing Certificate from Point University.

f9f355f1-d8e2-416e-8354-a9b0840c7293.description: Earners of the Facebook Marketing badge learn the principles and methods of optimizing and managing a Facebook account as part of a marketing strategy. They also learn advanced Facebook marketing tactics, including Facebook advertising.
f9f355f1-d8e2-416e-8354-a9b0840c7293.name: Facebook Marketing

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a Facebook marketing course with a final average grade of 80 or higher.

a4d7dc70-82c6-4748-9279-ae7a7406a7ee.description: Students earn this badge when completing the Google IT Support Certification. With this certification, students will learn the foundational skills that will help them prepare for a job in IT! This certification through Google can be earned in 6 months or less, and within those months, students will learn 5 keys areas of IT: troubleshooting, customer service, networking, operating systems, and security.
a4d7dc70-82c6-4748-9279-ae7a7406a7ee.name: Google IT Support Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Students need to complete the following courses to earn this badge: Technical Support Fundamentals, The Bits and Bytes of Computer Networking, Operating Systems and You: Becoming a Power User, System Administration and IT Infrastructure Services, IT Security: Defense against the digital dark arts

a3699714-e648-44b0-9125-aa511ef753ba.description: Point University’s 100% online l Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Certification program produces competent Six Sigma practitioners who successfully apply proven business principles, tools, and procedures to improve performance and quality in the field. Through rigorous coursework in quantitative analysis and Lean Six Sigma methodologies for business transformation, students will understand how to interpret, apply, and implement Lean Six Sigma at a high level of proficiency.
a3699714-e648-44b0-9125-aa511ef753ba.name: Six Sigma Green Belt

badge_template_activities.title: 2 courses and must also have Quantitative Analysis for decision making or relevant content prior to start Green belt course work.

c7188d5a-1cfd-4938-b66f-389dba662e14.description: The Certificate in Biblical Studies grounds students in the Christian Scriptures as a foundation for spiritual formation, faith integration, and a Christian worldview.
c7188d5a-1cfd-4938-b66f-389dba662e14.name: Biblical Studies Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Students who earn this badge have completed the following classes with 80% or higher: The Drama of Scripture, Jesus: The Focus of Scripture, Scripture: Reading & Interpretation, Spiritual Formation: Kingdom Living, and Christ, Culture & Career.

8de1e868-005f-469c-953c-1fc94511bced.description: This certification through Facebook will teach students how to establish an online presence, create posts, build a following and manage social media accounts. These skills can be used for a company’s advertising or social media campaigns!
8de1e868-005f-469c-953c-1fc94511bced.name: Facebook Social Media Marketing Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Students need to complete the following courses to earn this badge: Introduction to Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Fundamentals of Social Media Advertising, Advertising with Facebook, Measure and Optimize Social Media Marketing Campaigns, Facebook Social Media Marketing Capstone

0f35caaf-c9a9-48de-be68-bc33e3af8bb4.description: Students can start this certificate through IBM with no previous knowledge or experience in cybersecurity! In just 8 months, they can become job-ready by having the skills taught through this certificate, such as network security, incident response, threat intelligence, vulnerability assessment and more! Hands-on labs and instruction on cutting-edge security practices will enable them to become job-ready for a cybersecurity analyst role, projected to grow 32% between now and 2028.
0f35caaf-c9a9-48de-be68-bc33e3af8bb4.name: IBM Cybersecurity Analyst Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Courses included in certificate: Introduction to Cybersecurity Tools & Cyber Attacks, Cybersecurity Roles, Processes & Operating System Security, Cybersecurity Compliance Framework & System Administration, Network Security & Database Vulnerabilities, Penetration Testing, Incident Response and Forensics, Cyber Threat Intelligence Cybersecurity, Capstone: Breach Response Case Studies IBM Cybersecurity Analyst Assessment

3d7bb9f7-bbea-46fe-865d-7182084dbc6e.description: Students who earn this badge have completed the following classes with 80% or higher: Critical Reading & Writing, College Algebra, Human Anatomy & Physiology for Health Professionals, Medical Terminology, Introduction to Medical Coding & Billing, Medical Systems & Procedures, Medical Ethics & Legal Considerations, Clinical Externship in Medical Assisting
3d7bb9f7-bbea-46fe-865d-7182084dbc6e.name: Medical Assisting Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Students who earn this badge have completed the following classes with 80% or higher: Critical Reading & Writing, College Algebra, Human Anatomy & Physiology for Health Professionals, Medical Terminology, Introduction to Medical Coding & Billing, Medical Systems & Procedures, Medical Ethics & Legal Considerations, Clinical Externship in Medical Assisting

718baa36-6f40-4f42-a25f-0d563922bfac.description: Students who earn this badge have completed the following classes with 80% or higher: Critical Reading & Writing, Quantitative Reasoning, Human Anatomy & Physiology for Health Professionals, Medical Terminology, ICD Medical Coding & Billing, Insurance Claim Procedures, CPT Medical Coding & Billing, Hospital Coding & Billing
718baa36-6f40-4f42-a25f-0d563922bfac.name: Medical Coding and Billing Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Students who earn this badge have completed the following classes with 80% or higher: Critical Reading & Writing, Quantitative Reasoning, Human Anatomy & Physiology for Health Professionals, Medical Terminology, ICD Medical Coding & Billing, Insurance Claim Procedures, CPT Medical Coding & Billing, Hospital Coding & Billing

3de74422-8f15-4ecd-af7e-d0fefc64b6ae.description: Earn one of the most in-demand credentials in business with Point University’s l Lean Six Sigma Black Belt Certification program. Our comprehensive program equips students with the analytical skills needed to solve real-world problems and improve processes within an organization. The Lean Six Sigma Black Belt Certification is a professional level certification that prepares recipients to add organizational value through the application of the Lean Six Sigma methodology.
3de74422-8f15-4ecd-af7e-d0fefc64b6ae.name: Six Sigma Black Belt

badge_template_activities.title: If you have completed green belt, only two additional courses (Capstone Project) required - total of 4 courses plus relevant pre-req.
Capstone project required.

d79ac816-5832-4bbb-b4d7-79137a0a4722.description: Teaching English as a Second Language is a marketable skill throughout many industries across the globe. Earn this certificate in 12 months or less and students could be on their way to teaching! This certificate could be a great resource for those in education, administration, or translators.
d79ac816-5832-4bbb-b4d7-79137a0a4722.name: TESOL Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Students must complete the following courses to earn this badge: Teach English Now! Foundational Principles, Teach English Now! Theories of Second Language Acquisition, Teach English Now! Lesson Design and Assessment, Teach English Now! Capstone Project 1, Teach English Now! Second Language Reading, Writing, and Grammar, Teach English Now! Second Language Listening, Speaking, and Pronunciation, Teach English Now! Technology Enriched Teaching, Teach English Now! Capstone Project 2

skills.name: Teaching English As A Second Language
